What I Use

Here's a rundown of the tools I use in my everyday development.

  • Code editor: VS Code
  • Hosting: Netlify
  • Code Repo: BitBucket
  • Code Repo: GitHub
  • Casual Browser: Firefox
  • Dev Browser/Tools: Firefox Nightly
  • VPN: NordVPN
  • Email: Protonmail
  • Terminal: iTerm2
  • Video Meetings: Zoom
  • Workflow: Basecamp 3
  • Organization: Notion
  • Collaboration Boards: Trello
  • Photo Editing: Affinity Photo
  • Vector Work: Affinity Designer
  • Music: Spotify
  • Design: Sketch
  • Design: Figma
  • Design: Invision Studio
  • Mobile Design: Adobe XD
  • Wireframes: Balsamiq
  • Writing: Ulysses
  • Notes: Drafts
  • Emoji App: Rocket
  • Clipboard Manager: Flycut
